SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Challenge
Represents a specific playable environment, extending the GameEnvironment class.
ChallengeCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of Challenge instances.
ChallengeStrings
Keeps the Strings to be used by the Challenges instances.
ChallengeTest
This class is used to test Challenge methods
CombatConsumable
Represents a Combat Consumable item in the game, extending the Consumable class.
CombatConsumableCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of CombatConsumable items.
Consumable
Represents an abstract Consumable item in the game, extending the ItemHero class.
Entity
Represents an abstract entity in the game, with the attributes name, health points (hp), strength, and gold.
EnvironmentStringsTest
This class is used to test Environment methods
GameEnvironment
Represents an abstract game environment that provides playable scenarios.
GameTest
This class is used to test Game methods
GeneralStrings
Keeps the Strings to be used along the game
Hero
Represents a generic playable character, extending the Entity class.
HeroCreator
This class is responsible to create heroes objects to be used in tests
HeroTest
This class is used to test Heroes methods
Intern
Represents a specific type of Hero with unique characteristics.
ItemHero
Represents an abstract item in the game, that can be used by certain types of Heroes.
ItemsLimitationCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of allowedTo options.
Main
 
Node
Represents a point of decision in the game where the player chooses a path to go.
NodeCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of Node instances.
NodeStrings
Keeps the Strings to be used by the Nodes instances.
NodeTest
This class is used to test Node methods
Npc
Represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game.
NpcCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of NPC instances.
Potion
Represents a Potion in the game, extending the Consumable class.
PotionCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of Potion items.
Receptionist
Represents a specific type of Hero with unique characteristics.
Room
Represents a specific playable environment, extending the GameEnvironment class.
RoomCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of Room instances.
RoomStrings
Keeps the Strings to be used by the Rooms instances.
RoomTest
This class is used to test Room methods
SalesRepresentative
Represents a specific type of Hero with unique characteristics.
ScrantonSaga
Represents the game flow including hero creation, labyrinth navigation, and decision-making throughout the game.
Shopkeeper
Represents a specific playable environment, extending the GameEnvironment class.
ShopkeeperCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of Shopkeeper instances.
ShopkeeperStrings
Keeps the Strings to be used by the Shopkeepers instances.
ShopkeeperTest
This class is used to test Shopkeeper methods
Util
Provides common methods for user input validation and console management.
Weapon
Represents a weapon that a Hero can use, extending the ItemHero class.
WeaponCreator
A utility class for centralize the creation of Weapon items.
